input_text:
Job Title: Controls Engineer

Location: Rolla, MO

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Job Summary

Our client, a global leader in innovative packaging solutions, is looking for an Controls Engineer to join their growing team near Dixon MO! This role will require hands-on experience within PLC Programming. Previous experience in an Automation type role, along with extensive experience with Allen Bradley PLCs is preferred (will train on application). Experience with Robotics is nice to have but not a requirement.

This position is a rotating 12 hour 3rd shift (inquire about details). Relocation assistance is available to qualified candidates. Great benefits, including 8% annual variable bonus, 401k match, 3 weeks PTO package and reimbursement for continued education! Apply today!

location: Rolla, Missouri

job type: Permanent

salary: $90,000 - 95,000 per year

work hours: 8am to 4pm

education: High School

Responsibilities

Implement, upgrade, and troubleshoot PLC software applications and robotic applications (RSLogix 5000 and ABB) Read and interpret equipment manuals to develop a controls narrative or adjust current equipment functionality Modify existing applications as requested by operations to improve plant production and equipment reliability Design and maintain electrical schematics using AutoCAD format for any equipment changes Support multiple maintenance related projects

The Essential Functions Of This Role Include

working weekends

Qualifications

Experience level: ExperiencedMinimum 3 years of experienceEducation: High School

skills: 

PLCautomationAutoCAD

Equal Opportunity Employer: Race, Color, Religion, Sex, Sexual Orientation, Gender Identity, National Origin, Age, Genetic Information, Disability, Protected Veteran Status, or any other legally protected group status.

At Randstad, we welcome people of all abilities and want to ensure that our hiring and interview process meets the needs of all applicants. If you require a reasonable accommodation to make your application or interview experience a great one, please contact HRsupport@randstadusa.com.

Pay offered to a successful candidate will be based on several factors including the candidate's education, work experience, work location, specific job duties, certifications, etc. In addition, Randstad offers a comprehensive benefits package, including health, an incentive and recognition program, and 401K contribution (all benefits are based on eligibility).

Applications accepted on ongoing basis until filled.

Experience Level (if available): None
